did.abstract: The Brooklyn plumber business ledger, 1896-1900, lists the name and address of each client for whom work was performed, the type of work performed, the price of the work, and the date on which it was performed.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single volume.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Brooklyn plumber business ledger, 1985.025; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2024.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Brooklyn plumber business ledger is housed in a single bound volume and spans the period 1896 to 1900. The ledger lists the name and address of each client for whom work was performed, the type of work performed, the price of the work, and the date on which it was performed.
